modification:
1. Added a robust pre-filtering step using a specialized prompt to better identify receipts and reduce false positives
2. Implemented a two-pass verification system for receipt pages
3. Added post-processing to clean the final output by removing empty lists
4. Improved handling of receipt continuity with better context analysis
5. Implemented confidence scoring for receipt classification
6. Added explicit error handling for improved robustness
7. Enhanced the prompts with more specific instructions for receipt identification
8. Added metadata analysis to better distinguish receipts from non-receipt pages
9. Used the ReceiptRecognitionResultFormatting operator to standardize output
10. Implemented page content validation for more accurate receipt grouping
